channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Data Hub (DH_Foundation)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Data Hub (DH_Foundation)

item.title: CVE-2019-0390|2024-08-04T17:51:26.563Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20data%20hub%20%28dh_foundation%29
item.description: Under certain conditions SAP Data Hub (corrected in DH_Foundation version 2) allows an attacker to access information which would otherwise be restricted. Connection details that are maintained in Connection Manager are visible to users.
